channel.title: New Runescape COD and a bit of HALO wars
channel.description:
[size=10pt]This going to be a hard topic!!!![/size] but with your help we can try and do it!
Runescape .view(3rd person) .box of thing u can do (ie walk here, use) and stuff. .and mabey some objects ;D
Call of Duty :) .guns .camo's .attaments .some mapdate/modals if possablie.
Halo wars .squads .and mabey some more stuff ;)
Our plans (mabey add more to later.) :cool: .make modals .add mapdate .add objects .make client for it to run on. .make mebers modals .make squads .make trade .make areas to buy(like buy land then put what u like in it I.e build a bacacks to buy men build walls gates around your base) .make so you can take peoples bases over but not untill they able(like when they attack an other base u can attack theres)
and more details if you decide to join ;D :D ;) :)
Thanks for reading ;) Danny
